name: T - Emma Emily
_source: speak;Emily; N-No{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I think it'd be weird if I was.
speak;Emma; Listen, I know that you're scared,{w} but we need to stop them before they kill us or get to our village.
speak;Emily; Y-yeah!{w} You're right!{w} I'll just have to{tgm}...{tgm} just have to do my best!
speak;Emma; Don't be scared, Sis.{w} I've got your back and you have mine.
